title: Eddie Thinks He Can Kick A 30 Yard Field Goal + Dustin Lynch Talks About His Long-Distance Girlfriend + Bobby’s Mailbag: Can You Announce Your Divorce At Thanksgiving?
itunes:title: Eddie Thinks He Can Kick A 30 Yard Field Goal + Dustin Lynch Talks About His Long-Distance Girlfriend + Bobby’s Mailbag: Can You Announce Your Divorce At Thanksgiving?
description:
Bobby said he and Eddie were talking at dinner recently and Eddie brought up that he was almost a walk-on kicker in college. He bets that he can kick a 30-yard field goal tomorrow. Dustin Lynch stops by to talk about his old pop punk band, new tour and his long-distance girlfriend. Bobby reads an email from a listener who wants to announce her divorce on Thanksgiving so everyone can find out at once.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
